:::: {.content-visible unless-format="revealjs"}
1. In the left sidebar, click **{{< fa cubes >}} Inventory**.

1. Select a model or find your model by applying a filter or searching for it.^[[Working with the model inventory](/guide/model-inventory/working-with-model-inventory.qmd#search-filter-and-sort-models)]

1. On the landing page of your model, locate the [model status]{.smallcaps} section: 

    - Click **{{< fa arrow-right-arrow-left >}} See Workflow** to open the detailed workflow associated with that model.
    - The current workflow state will be highlighted on this detail view.

   ![Summary view of example workflow steps for a model](/guide/model-workflows/model-workflow.png){width=85% fig-alt="A summary view of example workflow steps for a model" .screenshot .lightbox}

While your lifecycle statuses and workflows are custom to your organization, some examples are:

- [In Documentation]{.bubble} — The model is currently being documented and can be submitted for validation next.
- [In Validation]{.bubble} — The model is currently being validated and can be submitted for review and then approval.

::::
